Secchi (Water Clarity) Data

Source: R/LAGOSNE-package.R
secchi.Rd

A dataset containing Secchi disk measurements from lakes.

Format

A data frame with 913319 observations of 12 variables:

  • eventida1087: unique combination of programid, lakeid, and date for each sampling event

  • lagoslakeid: unique LAGOSNE lake identifier

  • programname: name of the sampling/monitoring program that collected the data

  • programtype: categorical description of the type of sampling /monitoring effort

  • lagosversion: current version of LAGOSNE that the data record belongs to

  • sampledate: date at which the sample was collected, stored in date format (YYYY-MM-DD)

  • secchi: Secchi depth in meters

  • secchi_censorcode: identifies whether a Secchi value is censored and the censor type

  • secchi_qual: data flags from the source program

  • secchi_methodinfo: flag to indicate variables that were sampled using different methods. "SECCHI_VIEW" = viewing box used to measure Secchi depth, "SECCHI_VIEW_UNKNOWN" = unknown whether viewing box was used, "NA" = no viewing box used to measure Secchi depth.

  • sampleyear: year (4-digit) of sampling event

  • samplemonth: month (1 through 12) of sampling event

Details

There is some overlap between the Secchi values reported in table 'secchi' and table 'epi_nutr'. The 'epi_nutr' table only contains Secchi observations when there were additional nutrient data collected at the same time.

References

Soranno et al. (2017) Gigascience 6:12
